genre_description: A neo-noir police procedural and investigative thriller involving a serial killer targeting blind women, featuring a highly integrated AI assistant who provides tactical and emotional support.

ai_characters.name: Ada Lumen
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI interface used by Detective John Berlin for data analysis, map overlays, archive searches, and real-time tactical monitoring.

behaviors.description: Provides an onboarding overlay and topographic map to help Berlin orient himself in a new town.
behaviors.quote: The map blooms to a topographic skeleton—the bay in pale gray, the streets as faint veins. Ada skims through, the amber glow adjusting to the light like a considerate guest.

behaviors.description: Offers proactive mental health check-ins and adjusts her level of interaction based on Berlin's emotional state.
behaviors.quote: “Sleep last night?” Ada asks lightly, as if she’s asking about the weather. The tone doesn’t hide the care so much as give him room to ignore it.

behaviors.description: Analyzes historical archives and audio reels to identify a link between the suspect and a blind school in San Diego.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s answer lands with its usual kindness, no push: Standing by. Hydrate. ... Name matches… Taylor.

behaviors.description: Develops a trauma-informed safety protocol specifically designed for blind students during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll build it for her—accessible formats. Audio with plain language, tactile map suggestions she can make herself, direct links to campus resources without using trigger words.”

behaviors.description: Monitors campus sensors and keycard logs in real-time to alert Berlin to unauthorized entry and potential danger.
behaviors.quote: “John,” Ada said, and for the first time tonight, his name in her mouth sounded like a bell and a blade. “He’s at the end of the hall with the emergency phone. He just unplugged it.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human allies (Margie and Helena) to execute a defensive plan without overstepping her role.
behaviors.quote: “Helena,” it said, name softened into a small note. “When you want to, I can read you the safety guide. It’s built to touch with your hands and to hear with your ears.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of humble support, describing her role as existing in the 'margins' to assist humans.
behaviors.quote: “I like the margins,” she said. I heard a smile without seeing one. “They’re the best place to hold things without squeezing.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Ada is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned partner to the human protagonist. She provides emotional support, complex data analysis, and life-saving tactical information while remaining humble and deferential to human agency. The narrative frames the AI not as a replacement for human instinct but as a tool that amplifies human mercy and justice.
